backend/main.mo: Simple Motoko actor that exposes a single public function returning a hardcoded canister ID string.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four features related to replacing and cache-busting the founder profile image in the CoreTeam component with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files including components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining colors for UI elements, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Milletmist website with basic meta tags and a root div that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component that assembles all page sections (Navigation, Hero, AboutUs, CoreTeam, Products, FarmerSupport, Contact, Footer) with proper section IDs for navigation.
frontend/src/components/AboutUs.tsx: About section component showcasing Raavni Agrobyte's mission, story, team image, and four value cards highlighting women empowerment, quality, social impact, and natural goodness.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section displaying three contact cards with address, email, and phone information, plus a call-to-action inviting visitors to join the Milletmist journey.
frontend/src/components/CoreTeam.tsx: Core Team section displaying four team member profiles with triple-layer cache-busting strategy (unique filename, timestamp query parameter, unique React key) specifically for the founder's image (barnali-ceo-v34.dim_400x400.png) to force fresh loads.
frontend/src/components/DnsConfiguration: Component providing comprehensive DNS configuration guide with canister URL retrieval and step-by-step Cloudflare setup instructions (content truncated in source).
frontend/src/components/FarmerSupport.ts: React component displaying Milletmist's farmer support initiatives with impact cards showing direct partnership, sustainable income, training, and community building benefits. Includes a hero section with farmer imagery and descriptive text about empowering ultra-poor farmers.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Raavni Agrobyte branding, copyright information, and attribution link to caffeine.ai. Includes company logo and dynamic year display.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section component with full-screen background image, Raavni Agrobyte logo, headline text about health and impact, feature pills for natural millets/women-led/farmer support, and CTA buttons to explore products and story sections.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with scroll-based styling, desktop and mobile menu support, smooth scrolling to sections (home, about, team, products, farmer-support, contact), and active section highlighting based on scroll position.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Products showcase component displaying two millet-based products (Protein Bar and Energy Boost) with images, descriptions, and benefit badges, plus a section highlighting general millet health and sustainability benefits.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages backend actor instances based on Internet Identity authentication state, automatically invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options for ICP integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a custom React Query hook `useCanisterId` that fetches the canister ID from the actor when available and not currently fetching.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for a warm earth-toned color scheme (terracotta, sage, amber) supporting light/dark modes, custom fonts (Inter, Playfair Display), and gradient utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH color system, typography plugins, custom animations (accordion, fade-in, slide-up), and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata for Raavni Agrobyte/Milletmist website tracking features, known issues (logo display, button clicks, image caching), and architectural notes about the women-led millet products company.
